verses.verse: And there <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4397>angels<s%> to <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> at <S%H6153>even<s%>; and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3427>sat<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>: and <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H7200>seeing<s%> them rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H7125>meet<s%> them; and he <S%H7812>bowed<s%> himself with his <S%H639>face<s%> toward the <S%H776>ground<s%>;

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, Behold now, my <S%H113>lords<s%>, turn <S%H5493>in<s%>, I pray you, into your <S%H5650>servant's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, and tarry all <S%H3885>night<s%>, and <S%H7364>wash<s%> your <S%H7272>feet<s%>, and ye shall rise up <S%H7925>early<s%>, and <S%H1980>go<s%> on your <S%H1870>ways<s%>. And they <S%H559>said<s%>, Nay; but we will <S%H3885>abide<s%> in the <S%H7339>street<s%> all <S%H3885>night<s%>.

And he <S%H6484>pressed<s%> upon them <S%H3966>greatly<s%>; and they turned <S%H5493>in<s%> unto him, and <S%H935>entered<s%> into his <S%H1004>house<s%>; and he <S%H6213>made<s%> them a <S%H4960>feast<s%>, and did <S%H644>bake<s%> unleavened <S%H4682>bread<s%>, and they did <S%H398>eat<s%>.

¶ But before they lay <S%H7901>down<s%>, the <S%H582>men<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>, even the <S%H582>men<s%> of <S%H5467>Sodom<s%>, <S%H5437>compassed<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5437>round<s%>, both <S%H2205>old<s%> and <S%H5288>young<s%>, all the <S%H5971>people<s%> from every <S%H7097>quarter<s%>:

And they <S%H7121>called<s%> unto <S%H3876>Lot<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, Where are the <S%H582>men<s%> which came <S%H935>in<s%> to thee this <S%H3915>night<s%>? bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> unto us, that we may <S%H3045>know<s%> them.
And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> unto them, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%> after <S%H310>him<s%>,
And <S%H559>said<s%>, I pray you, <S%H251>brethren<s%>, do not so <S%H7489>wickedly<s%>.

Behold now, I have <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> which have not <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H376>man<s%>; let me, I pray you, bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> unto you, and <S%H6213>do<s%> ye to them as is <S%H2896>good<s%> in your <S%H5869>eyes<s%>: only unto <S%H411>these<s%> <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> <S%H408%H1697>nothing<s%>; for therefore <S%H935>came<s%> they under the <S%H6738>shadow<s%> of my <S%H6982>roof<s%>.

And they <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5066>Stand<s%> <S%H1973>back<s%>. And they <S%H559>said<s%> again, This <S%H259>one<s%> fellow came <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H1481>sojourn<s%>, and he will <S%H8199>needs<s%> be a <S%H8199>judge<s%>: now will we deal <S%H7489>worse<s%> with thee, than with them. And they <S%H6484>pressed<s%> <S%H3966>sore<s%> upon the <S%H376>man<s%>, even <S%H3876>Lot<s%>, and came <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H7665>break<s%> the <S%H1817>door<s%>.
But the <S%H582>men<s%> put <S%H7971>forth<s%> their <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and <S%H935>pulled<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> into the <S%H1004>house<s%> to them, and <S%H5462>shut<s%> to the <S%H1817>door<s%>.

And they <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H582>men<s%> that were at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> with <S%H5575>blindness<s%>, both <S%H6996>small<s%> and <S%H1419>great<s%>: so that they <S%H3811>wearied<s%> themselves to <S%H4672>find<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%>.

¶ And the <S%H582>men<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3876>Lot<s%>, Hast thou <S%H6311>here<s%> <S%H4310>any<s%> besides? son in <S%H2860>law<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>sons<s%>, and thy <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and <S%H834>whatsoever<s%> thou hast in the <S%H5892>city<s%>, bring them <S%H3318>out<s%> of this <S%H4725>place<s%>:

For <S%H587>we<s%> will <S%H7843%H853>destroy<s%> this <S%H4725>place<s%>, because the cry of <S%H6818>them<s%> is waxen <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H854>before<s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>; and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H7971>sent<s%> us to <S%H7843>destroy<s%> it.

And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%>, and <S%H1696>spake<s%> unto his sons in <S%H2860>law<s%>, which <S%H3947>married<s%> his <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H6965>Up<s%>, get you <S%H3318>out<s%> of this <S%H4725>place<s%>; for the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H7843>destroy<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%>. But he seemed as one that <S%H6711>mocked<s%> <S%H5869>unto<s%> his sons in <S%H2860>law<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3644>when<s%> the <S%H7837>morning<s%> <S%H5927>arose<s%>, then the <S%H4397>angels<s%> <S%H213>hastened<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H6965>Arise<s%>, <S%H3947>take<s%> thy <S%H802>wife<s%>, and thy <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>, which are <S%H4672>here<s%>; lest thou be <S%H5595>consumed<s%> in the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

And while he <S%H4102>lingered<s%>, the <S%H582>men<s%> laid <S%H2388>hold<s%> upon his <S%H3027>hand<s%>, and upon the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and upon the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>; the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> being <S%H2551>merciful<s%> unto him: and they brought him <S%H3318>forth<s%>, and set <S%H3240>him<s%> <S%H2351>without<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, when they had brought them <S%H3318>forth<s%> <S%H2351>abroad<s%>, that he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4422>Escape<s%> <S%H5921>for<s%> thy <S%H5315>life<s%>; <S%H5027>look<s%> not behind <S%H310>thee<s%>, neither <S%H5975>stay<s%> thou in all the <S%H3603>plain<s%>; <S%H4422>escape<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, lest thou be <S%H5595>consumed<s%>.
And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, Oh, not so, my <S%H113>Lord<s%>:

Behold now, thy <S%H5650>servant<s%> hath <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in thy <S%H5869>sight<s%>, and thou hast <S%H1431>magnified<s%> thy <S%H2617>mercy<s%>, which thou hast <S%H6213>shewed<s%> unto <S%H5978>me<s%> in <S%H2421>saving<s%> my <S%H5315>life<s%>; and I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H4422>escape<s%> to the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, lest some <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1692>take<s%> me, and I <S%H4191>die<s%>:

Behold now, this <S%H5892>city<s%> is <S%H7138>near<s%> to <S%H5127>flee<s%> unto, and <S%H1931>it<s%> is a little <S%H4705>one<s%>: Oh, let me <S%H4422>escape<s%> thither, (is it not a little <S%H4705>one<s%>?) and my <S%H5315>soul<s%> shall <S%H2421>live<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto him, <S%H2009>See<s%>, I have <S%H5375>accepted<s%> <S%H6440>thee<s%> concerning this <S%H1697>thing<s%> also, that I will not <S%H2015>overthrow<s%> this <S%H5892>city<s%>, for the <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H1696>spoken<s%>.

<S%H4116>Haste<s%> thee, <S%H4422>escape<s%> thither; for I <S%H3201>cannot<s%> <S%H6213>do<s%> any <S%H1697>thing<s%> till thou be <S%H935>come<s%> thither. Therefore the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>.
¶ The <S%H8121>sun<s%> was <S%H3318>risen<s%> upon the <S%H776>earth<s%> when <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>.

Then the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H4305>rained<s%> upon <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and upon <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%> <S%H1614>brimstone<s%> and <S%H784>fire<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> out of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>;

And he <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> <S%H411>those<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and all the <S%H3603>plain<s%>, and all the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of the <S%H5892>cities<s%>, and that which <S%H6780>grew<s%> upon the <S%H127>ground<s%>.
¶ But his <S%H802>wife<s%> looked <S%H5027>back<s%> from behind <S%H310>him<s%>, and she became a <S%H5333>pillar<s%> of <S%H4417>salt<s%>.
¶ And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> gat up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> where he <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%>:

And he <S%H8259>looked<s%> <S%H6440>toward<s%> <S%H5467>Sodom<s%> and <S%H6017>Gomorrah<s%>, and <S%H6440>toward<s%> all the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain<s%>, and <S%H7200>beheld<s%>, and, lo, the <S%H7008>smoke<s%> of the <S%H776>country<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> as the <S%H7008>smoke<s%> of a <S%H3536>furnace<s%>.

¶ And it came to pass, when <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7843>destroyed<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of the <S%H3603>plain<s%>, that <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H2142>remembered<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> out of the <S%H8432>midst<s%> of the <S%H2018>overthrow<s%>, when he <S%H2015>overthrew<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> in the <S%H2004>which<s%> <S%H3876>Lot<s%> <S%H3427>dwelt<s%>.

¶ And <S%H3876>Lot<s%> went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>, and <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in the <S%H2022>mountain<s%>, and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%> with him; for he <S%H3372>feared<s%> to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H6820>Zoar<s%>: and he <S%H3427>dwelt<s%> in a <S%H4631>cave<s%>, he and his <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1323>daughters<s%>.

And the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H6810>younger<s%>, Our <S%H1>father<s%> is <S%H2204>old<s%>, and there is not a <S%H376>man<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%> to come <S%H935>in<s%> unto us after the <S%H1870>manner<s%> of all the <S%H776>earth<s%>:

<S%H3212>Come<s%>, let us <S%H8248>make<s%> our <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%>, and we will <S%H7901>lie<s%> with him, that we may <S%H2421>preserve<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> of our <S%H1>father<s%>.

And they <S%H8248>made<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> that <S%H3915>night<s%>: and the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> went <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H7901>lay<s%> with her <S%H1>father<s%>; and he <S%H3045>perceived<s%> not when she lay <S%H7901>down<s%>, nor when she <S%H6965>arose<s%>.

And it came to pass on the <S%H4283>morrow<s%>, that the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H6810>younger<s%>, Behold, I <S%H7901>lay<s%> <S%H570>yesternight<s%> with my <S%H1>father<s%>: let us make him <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> this <S%H3915>night<s%> also; and go thou <S%H935>in<s%>, and <S%H7901>lie<s%> with him, that we may <S%H2421>preserve<s%> <S%H2233>seed<s%> of our <S%H1>father<s%>.

And they <S%H8248>made<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3915>night<s%> also: and the <S%H6810>younger<s%> <S%H6965>arose<s%>, and <S%H7901>lay<s%> with him; and he <S%H3045>perceived<s%> not when she lay <S%H7901>down<s%>, nor when she <S%H6965>arose<s%>.
Thus were <S%H8147>both<s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3876>Lot<s%> with <S%H2029>child<s%> by their <S%H1>father<s%>.

And the <S%H1067>firstborn<s%> <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H4124>Moab<s%>: the <S%H1931>same<s%> is the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H4124>Moabites<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.

And the <S%H6810>younger<s%>, she also <S%H3205>bare<s%> a <S%H1121>son<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H1151>Ben-ammi<s%>: the same is the <S%H1>father<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon<s%> unto this <S%H3117>day<s%>.
